name: fixing typos
description: In this dataset I found that about 13 of search term has some typos. Fixing Typos with Google There are a lot of misspellings in the search term field as it is normal for inputs in a search engine. spell_check is a simple function that uses google to remove typos. unfortunately it does not work on kaggle it sends requests to google And this is the resulting dictionary for the typos searches relax and don t let google be angry searches metal plate cover gcfi artric air portable roll roofing lap cemet basemetnt window vynal grip strip lawn mower electic for search in searches.
script: random spell_check randint 2 power model xy_2900600_u'
